title: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172447im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_4371.jpg)

My company is designing a Buck Rogers in the 25th Century book. In the show, they use this type a lot in the background. This is the clearest picture I could get of it. Is this a specific typeface? Or can someone point me towards something similar? My boss wants me to find 'THE' Buck Rogers typeface.

Thank you!!!!!!!!
author: ellaytham
